attributes.action: Stop tax payer's money going to the elderly of China, India and Mexico.
attributes.additional_details: This Government together with past governments have eroded our Military personnel's housing, we have thousands of people living on the streets, our NHS is in severe crisis, our schools are over populated and our own elderly live in fear of significantly high heating bills.  This is so wrong!  This Government needs to take care of our own and let other countries do the same!
attributes.background: It has been widely reported in the media that our Government is planning to spend £1.3 billion UK tax payers' money on the improvement of social care for the elderly of China, India and Mexico. together with some of the funding going towards supporting these countries fashion and film industry.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could ask the Government to introduce new rules about how overseas aid is spent.
